p: Four to five weeks aged male Swiss albino mice having bodyweight of 20–30 g (Maintained by the Department of Pharmacy, Jahangirnagar University, Savar, Dhaka, Bangladesh) were used for the analgesic, antidiarrheal, and antihyperglycemic experiments. Before initiating the experiments, the animals were kept under standard environmental conditions, maintained at 55%–65% relative humidity and exposure to alternative 12:12 h light and dark cycle at an ambient temperature of 26 ± 2 °C. Proper supply of foods and water ad libitum was ensured. This study was approved by the Biosafety, Biosecurity, and Ethical Clearance Committee, Jahangirnagar University (Memo no.: BBEC, JU/M 2020 (3)4).
